/usr/lib/hpc/compiler/gnu/7/bin/c++  -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/CUDA_Interface_Example.dir/CUDA_Interface_Example_generated_CUDA_Interface_Example.cu.o  -o ../CUDA_Interface_Example   -L/scratch/gpi/seis/HEX/GpuFit/Gpufit/Gpufit  -Wl,-rpath,/scratch/gpi/seis/HEX/GpuFit/Gpufit/Gpufit -Wl,-Bstatic -lcudart_static -Wl,-Bdynamic -ldl -lrt ../libGpufit.so -Wl,-Bstatic -lcudart_static -Wl,-Bdynamic -lpthread -ldl -lrt
